overview:
Sudhir Choudhrie is an Asian industrialist specializing in cross-border investments, deals involving emerging markets including new technologies in India and elsewhere.

Mr. Choudhrie has served as a Director and member of the board of Magnum International Trading Company, Ltd. since its founding in 1975, where he has focused on both the supervision of marketing activities and the exploration of export markets dealing with the far east. Sudhir Choudhrie has also been a Non-Executive Director of Ebookers PLC since October 1999, now serving as Chairman of the Compensation Committee, Member of the Nominating Committee and Member of the Audit Committee of Ebookers PLC.

Sudhir Choudhrie holds a Bachelor of Arts Degree in Economics from Delhi University. Mr. Choudhrie is also an underwriter of several important charitable organizations and has personally donated to many others in London and abroad. He is a noted benefactor of the Columbia University Medical Center in New York where he has been a liberal donor for many years.
